description: Schema for configuring a research paper.

draft.description: Indicates if the paper is a draft version.

anonymous.description: Indicates if the paper is anonymous.

camera-ready.description: Indicates if the paper is a camera-ready version.

libraries.description: List of libraries used in the paper.

knowledges.description: List of knowledge files to use in the paper.

appendix.description: List of appendices included in the paper.
